# Order Test For All for WooCommerce

Make sure your checkout works. Test your WooCommerce order process in seconds.

**Contributors:** [ikamal](https://profiles.wordpress.org/ikamal)  
**Tags:** [wc order test](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/wc-order-test),[wc order](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/wc-order),[woocommerce](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/woocommerce),[woocommerce checkout](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/woocommerce-checkout),[woocommerce order](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/woocommerce-order),[woocommerce orders](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/woocommerce-orders)  
**Requires at least:** 3.0.1  
**Tested up to:** 5.8  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  
**Donate link:** https://kamalhosen.xyz/  
**Requires PHP:** 5.6  

## Description ##

A payment gateway plugin for WooCommerce to see if your checkout works.

See plugin's GitHub repository [Order Test For All for WooCommerce](https://github.com/ikamal7/wc-order-test-all)

### **Required Plugin**
* WooCommerce

### **PRIVACY POLICY**

We are not collecting any of your personal data or any kind of logs. So there will be no chance to violate your privacy through this plugin.

## Installation ##

### Install from WP Dashboard ###
* Log into WP dashboard then click **Plugins** > **Add new** > Then under the title "Install Plugins" click **Upload** > **choose the zip** > **Activate the plugin!**

### Install from FTP ###
* Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WP installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.


## Frequently Asked Questions ##

### Do I need WooCommerce plugin installed for this to work ###
YES.  This sets up a test gateway for WooCommerce only.
